title: Good Air™
description: These odor eliminating candles and home fragrancing products counteract odors in the air, leaving your home smelling fresh, clean and odor free!

asset.author: The Yankee Candle Company
asset.description: These odor eliminating candles and home fragrancing products counteract odors in the air, leaving your home smelling fresh, clean and odor free!

transcripts: There's nothing like a clean and fresh smelling home. In the bath, the laundry, the kitchen, pet areas, and the nursery. But sometimes the things you love can overstay their welcome. Fortunately there's Yankee Candle Good Air. Using a patented technology, Good Air sticks to odor molecules. Neutralizing them on contact to leave your home smelling fresh and clean. Choose from two great scents. Just plain clean and just plain fresh. In a variety of products for every situation. It's odors out, good airs in. With Yankee Candle Good Air. For a fresh and clean smelling home anytime.
